Html: I notice that you don't have any options for the Idol of the Raven Goddess (an extra 0.9% spell crit chance) or the Idol of the Unseen Moon (chance on moonfire cast to grant +140 spell dmg). Are we able to get these in the mix and see how they fare dmg wise in our rotations versus the Ivory Idol of the Moon Goddess?

The idol calculations are in Rawr, but for some odd reason they're not being grabbed from the Armory. Add the item id's manually and they will work. Please note that Idol of the Unseen Moon will only show the +140 spell damage if the selected rotation includes Moonfire.
